main event: An object was observed descending and then ascending at a 45Â° angle before speeding away in Tempe, Arizona on 28 April 1947.
interesting points: The object was described as silver in color., The object displayed high speed., The altitude of the object varied during observation., The observation lasted between 24 and 30 seconds., The sighting was reported by a civilian.
sighted object: a silver object in the sky
